content:
Create a Quick Action to Store the Generated Voice Call Summaries

You need Customize Application permission to create quick actions.

To store generated summaries, use standard or custom fields of the VoiceCall object or its related objects. For custom fields, create Text Area or Text Area (Long) field types.

In Setup:

*   Open the Salesforce object that stores generated summaries.
*   Click Buttons, Links, and Actions.
*   Click New Action.
*   Select Update a Record and enter a label like "Update Voice Call with Summaries."
*   Save and select fields to store summaries.
title: Service Cloud Quick Actions and Work Summaries
